long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ProSurf enhances your browsing security by leveraging the Google Safe Browsing API, marking URLs with visual indicators.

Features:

Google Safe Browsing Integration: Instantly check URLs against an updated database of unsafe sites.
Visual Status Indicators: Easily spot secure (blue dot) and potentially unsafe (red dot) URLs.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple design for intuitive use.
Ongoing Development: We're expanding our database to enhance protection.
How It Works:

Enter a URL.
Click "Scan" to check its safety status.
Note: Our database is continuously growing. Your patience is appreciated. Double-check before visiting any website.

Beta Version: ProSurf is currently in testing. Your feedback helps us improve.
Get Started: Install ProSurf from the Chrome Web Store.

Development Stage: ProSurf is evolving. For issues, bugs, or suggestions, contact us at prosurfhelp@gmail.com. Your feedback shapes a safer browsing experience. Thank you for supporting ProSurf! ❤️
